sentences.sContent: I played firecracker but I hurt my finger with the fire.
sentences.sContent_eng: I played firecracker but I hurt my finger with the fire.
sentences.sCn: 在我玩爆竹的时候，伤着了我的手指。

sentences.sContent: As we came in the second time, Kasokola was ready, and we put the first firecracker straight into the campfire.
sentences.sContent_eng: As we came in the second time, Kasokola was ready, and we put the first firecracker straight into the campfire.
sentences.sCn: 我们再次飞回来时，卡索科拉已经准备好了。 我们第一发爆竹炸弹径直射进了篝火中。

sentences.sContent: Red firecracker chaff left behind after store-opening celebrations attests to the optimism of many investors.
sentences.sContent_eng: Red firecracker chaff left behind after store-opening celebrations attests to the optimism of many investors.
sentences.sCn: 市场开张庆典后的爆竹残渣,足以印证多数投资者的乐观情绪.

trans.tranOther: a small  firework  that explodes loudly
